alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 30 at 3:01AM PST until January 01 at 7:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, Death Valley National Park and Western Mojave Desert. In Nevada, Western Clark and Southern Nye County, Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 7 AM Saturday to 7 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
